name: Laser Island
description:
Escape the Laser! 

You have until the laser catches you to solve the puzzles and survive.

Quick paced puzzle game

- arrow keys or WASD to move

- Space to interact

- click an inventory item to select / deselect

- R to reset

HINTS BELOW DON'T SCROLL DOWN UNLESS REALLY STUCK :

----------------------------

read the sign twice

you need the metal detector equipped to find dig spots
